solution_line_template: Wendy drove {miles_day1} miles + {miles_day2} miles = <<{miles_day1}+{miles_day2}={miles_first_two_days}>>{miles_first_two_days} miles on the first two days.
So on the third day, she drove {total_miles_trip} miles - {miles_first_two_days} miles = <<{total_miles_trip}-{miles_first_two_days}={miles_day3}>>{miles_day3} miles.
